timeline.message: [GEOS-9678] SldService numberFormatException if percentages true with customClasses

[GEOS-9678] SldService numberFormatException if percentages true with customClasses

timeline.body:
You extrac cm, but then use classMembers[i] right next line? :-D

```suggestion
            if (cm != 0d && total != 0d) percentages[i] = (cm / total) * 100;
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
You extrac cm, but then use classMembers[i] right next line? :-D

Suggested change
if (cm != 0d && total != 0d) percentages[i] = (classMembers[i] / total) * 100;
if (cm != 0d && total != 0d) percentages[i] = (cm / total) * 100;
